all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
I, the Lord, am bound when ye do what I say; but when ye do not what I say, ye have no promise.
Doctrine and Covenants 82:10
Quote of the Day
"If you want a true relationship with Christ, show Him by making covenants and honoring them with faithfulness and loyalty."
Elder Sandino Roman | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
